text: « ‹Naa ɠa é ba, tɛi é ɠɛa ɠana, nɛ̀i gè ga Izilayɛle ná-GALAGI, gòoi ɠa é ga nii: Gè minazeɠeni è ʋɛ, ɗa-o, ɗa-ʋɛlɛyeɠei-yo, ta è-mɛmɛwolani tɔnɔ ma ʋɛlɛyeɠei ɓalaa, ga wa ɠa wo ga nà-botiɠɛ nuiti yeenɔpɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ. Kɛlɛ, nɔ̀un nà, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà bosu è ma ga minazeɠegi naa li poun. Mazɔlɔɔ nà ɗa ɠaazu unfegi ve naati bɛ, niiti ti dɛ̀bizu, kɛlɛ niiti ti bɛ̀lɛlalazu, unfegi ɠa ɗa yei ga tiye.
